Terima kasih atas penterjemahan Bahasa Malaysia: 4zz, myroots, wan_mohammad, HarimauMalayaHM

Lucky Patcher merupakan aplikasi penampal sejagat. Ia bertujuan untuk mengubah suai aplikasi dengan cara berikut: Padam iklan, Buang pengesahan lesen Google (automatik dan manual), Mengurus kebenaran, dan banyak lagi.
Aktiviti aplikasi yang digunakan untuk Pengiklanan.
Tunjukkan semua aplikasi dengan Google Ads.
Semua pengubahan telah dibaiki dalam ODEX dan akan berterusan sehingga aplikasi tersebut dipasang kembali!
Use the Magisk module to apply the patch
Menetapkan semula tampalan android pada memulakan semula
Please use Xposed(lSPosed) for apply current patch
Nama fail untuk APK-APK yang telah disusun semula
Skema penamaan untuk fail-fail APK terbaharu.
Aplikasi tidak ditemui! Sila pasang semula aplikasi dan cuba lagi.`
Aplikasi ini tidak dapat dijumpai dalam senarai aplikasi yang dipasang.
Data aplikasi kosong. Tiada data untuk salinan.
Ralat: Ada sesuatu yang tidak kena. Nampaknya sandaran tidak siap.
Anda pasti untuk padam salinan ini?
Do you really want to delete backup app settings
Cannot restore application settings because it is not installed.
Do you really want restore backup app settings
Root not stable. Try again or update your root. Try changing the java-root method in the settings of Lucky Patcher. It can help sometimes.
Anda mahu cuba dapatkan item ini secara percuma?
Untuk mematikan autoulang, anda perlu pilih aplikasi dan pergi ke \"Alat\"->\"Buang pembelian yang telah disimpan\" dan buang item.

"- Untuk hasil yang terbaik, anda perlu buat satu patch ke Android \"Status Pengesahan Pengenalan sentiasa Betul\"; - Untuk matikan godaman, pergi ke \"Suis\" pada panel bawah Lucky Patcher dan pilih \"Matikan Emulasi Bil Google\"."

Memerlukan \"Patch Sokongan untuk DalamAplikasi dan LVL\" untuk menyasarkan Aplikasi dan \"Patch ke Android\" yang diaplikasi. Guna patch ubahsuai \"Sokongan.DalamAplikasi.LVL...\" untuk Google Play untuk maklumat pembelian sebenar dan harga dalam aplikasi.
Hantar balasan kpd aplikasi yang tidak dikenalpasti (ini mungkin berhasil untuk pengguna-pengguna tanpa-root)
If the purchase fails, try changing the type of this purchase in \"%1s\"->\"%2s\".
This service is needed for \"Support patch for InApp and LVL emulation\" and rebuild the application with him.
Proxy server for emulation of inapp purchases
Anda mahu buang direktori jilidan ini?
Penjilidan gagal! Direktori data tidak ditemui pada peranti.
Amaran: Busybox tidak ditemui. Lucky Patcher tidak boleh diteruskan tanpa Busybox...
Move data to a new location
Data transfer was disabled because a folder inside the previous one was selected. Data folder changed to %1$s.
Anda boleh menukar ikon standard untuk Lucky Patcher pada pelancar anda.
Make data and cache backups for installation.
"Menyekat Internet untuk aplikasi yang dipilih Mungkin tidak berfungsi pada Android 4+"
APK dengan Keizinan dan Aktiviti yang diubah
Removes integrity check and signature verification
Injects code into the application to bypass the dex checksum and signature verification. This method doubles the size of the application.
"Matikan kaedah komponen 'matikan pm'(mungkin diaktifkan oleh aplikasi)"
"Tukar Keizinan Simpan pengenalan asal. (kaedah tidak stabil)"
Cuba sembunyikan Lucky Patcher dari aplikasi lain. Membebankan sistem, guna jika perlu saja.
Integrasi kod dalvik ke aplikasi yang telah dipasang
Sepadukan kemas kini ke aplikasi dipilih /sistem
Pindah aplikasi dipilih ke storan dalaman
Pindah aplikasi dipilih ke Kad SD
Re-sign with original signature for android patch \"%1s\".
"Ubah Keizinan dan Aktiviti Bina Semula dan Pasang"
"Tukar Keizinan dan Aktiviti Simpan Pengenalan asal (Kaedah Selamat)"

"Injects code into the application that tries to trick the application's signature verification. It must be applied strictly for the original application. If the application has already been rebuilt, this will not only not help, but can also harm if the option has already been implemented successfully."
Koyok Sokongan untuk DalamAplikasi dan emulasi LVL
"Membuka Sekatan Internet untuk aplikasi yang dipilih Mungkin tidak berfungsi pada Android 4+"
Buang pautan http:// menggunakan templat dari fail AdsBlockList_user_edit.txt dan AdsBlockList.txt.
"Patch pada But semula (Tidak stabil! Hanya untuk patching libs)"
Diperlukan untuk pelagakan DalamAplikasi, LVL dan penjana kunci. Diperlukan untuk pengesahan benar pembelian dan lesen.

Membenarkan pengubahsuaian sesebuah aplikasi tanpa membuat pengenalan baharu, supaya pengenalan pembangun tidak disentuh. Pengguna lain boleh memasang .apk ini hanya selepas memasang patch ke Teras Android (berguna ketika menterjemah, mengubahsuai grafik, dsb. dalam aplikasi yang dilindungi)
Matikan pengesahan pengenalan di dalam pengurus pakej
Membenarkan pemasangan aplikasi dengan pengenalan lain di atas satu sama lain.
"+ Membenarkan pemasangan aplikasi dengan versi yang lebih lama daripada versi yang sudah dipasang."
Patch sokongan untuk DalamAplikasi dan emulasi LVL
Diperlukan untuk pelagakan berfungsi tanpa Patch sokongan kepada Aplikasi.
Padam semua koyok dari Android services.jar
Padam semua patch dari Android core.jar
Percubaan untuk menjadikan aplikasi berfungsi tanpa talian
Jika ada, sila pasang internet ketika pelancaran pertama. Kumpulan patch ini akan lakukan sedikit perubahan.
Jika ada, mungkin tidak perlu sambungan internet ketika pelancaran pertama.
Masih belum stabil tetapi sangat berkesan. Jika ada, benarkan sambungan internet pada pelancaran pertama.
Templat untuk pengesahan lesen akhir. Jika ini berfungsi, aplikasi akan bekerja tanpa sambungan internet.
Jika \"Pengesahan Lesen Akhir\" tidak berhasil, anda boleh cuba patch-patch ni.
Cuba untuk memecahkan mekanisme perolehan Iklan Google.
Lain-lain patch yang mana mungkin berguna untuk membuang iklan.
Buatkan modul iklan menyangka ia di luar talian.
Padam Pengesahan Lesen untuk aplikasi-aplikasi dari Amazon Market.
Membuang kebergantungan Google Play dan lain-lain...
Bilangan minimum daripada penampal. Sesuai untuk kebanyakan aplikasi dengan perlindungan yang mudah.
Terdapat beberapa perbezaan dari \"Mod auto\". Ia mungkin membantu anda, sekiranya \"Mod auto\" tidak berhasil.

Patch tambahan (mungkin menyebabkan ketidakstabilan). Diaplikasikan hanya jika lain-lain pattern tidak berjaya. Memerlukan internet. Sila cuba bersama dengan \"Mod auto\" atau \"Mod auto (Songsang)\".

Semua pengubahan ditulis secara tersedia untuk fail-odex. Tetapi kaedah ini tidak akan berfungsi dengan baik jika aplikasi telah dipindahkan ke kad SD luaran. Dalam situasi ini \"Menggunakan Tampalan untuk dalvik-cache\" mungkin boleh membantu. Anda boleh memulihkan semula aplikasi hanya dengan pemasangan semula.
Akan menyalin fail pakej aplikasi ke folder Lucky Patcher pada kad SD. Anda boleh memulihkan semula aplikasi dari salinan apk.
Padam cache dalvik aplikasi untuk menjimatkan ruang selepas menghasilkan fail-odex. Jika aplikasi tidak dapat beroperasi dengan baik dengan odex, anda perlu memasang semula aplikasi tersebut.
The minimum number of patches. Only works with google Play installed. When you first start a hacked program, you need the Internet.
Padam Pengesahan Lesen untuk aplikasi-aplikasi dari SamsungApps.
Jika peranti membeku atau tidak semua tampalan berfungsi, sila mulakan semula peranti secara manual.
"Tampalan Android untuk dalvik-cache selesai. Keputusannya adalah: "

Dalvik cache daripada core.jar telah ditampalkan, tetapi tampalan jenis ini boleh hilang semasa mengemaskini dalvik-cache. Ruang tidak mencukupi di dalam Sistem ROM untuk mencipta core.odex. Sila bebaskan kira-kira 4MB, bersihkan dalvik-cache dan cuba lagi. Sila mulakan semula peranti untuk menetapkan tampalan ke dalvik-cache.
tampalan dalvik-cache sentiasa pada mulakan semula (hanya jika tampalan core.jar dikeluarkan selepas memulakan semula).
Fail yang dimuatturun rosak. Sila semak samada masih ada ruang kosong dalam Kad SD kemudian cuba lagi.
Ia tidak berhasil untuk semua aplikasi. Jika klon tidak dipasang, anda perlu membuang yang asal punya. Jika kaedah ini tidak berhasil juga, cuba hasilkan satu klon dengan jalan yang lain.
ia tidak berhasil untuk semua aplikasi. Kaedah ini cuba mengubah sumber dan classes.dex. Seperti klon yang lebih terpencil daripada yang asal.
Berjaya! Lesennya telah berjaya dicipta. Cuba untuk menguji aplikasi semasa di luar talian. Mungkin anda akan bernasib baik.
Pembinaan semula apk untuk DalamApl dan emulasi LVL

"
Nota Bene! Jika aplikasi berfungsi dengan baik setelah ditampalkan, tiada jaminan bahawa ia akan meningkatkan kerja dalam bentuk apk yang-diubahsuai - beberapa aplikasi mungkin dilindungi daripada pengubahsuaian. Anda cenderung untuk menjadi lebih bernasib baik dengan menampal, berbanding dengan mengubahsuai."

Perhatian! Sesetengah aplikasi perlu dinyahpasang sebelum pemasangan aplikasi klon. Tiada jaminan ia akan beroperasi dengan baik dalam bentuk apk klon - sesetengah aplikasi juga dipelihara dari pengubahsuaian.
Custom Patch not valid for this Version of the Programm or already patched.
Not all patterns are replaced, but the program can work, test it!

Patch Ubahsuai tidak ditemui. Ia bermasalah dengan root. Janga akses kad SD dari root. Jika anda guna SuperSu, cuba nyahaktif \"pemisahan ruangnama mount\" dalam SuperSu. Jika ia tidak membantu, sila kemaskini SuperSu dan kemaskini fail binary su dari SuperSu.
Tiada kemaskini untuk penampal tersuai yang ditemui.
Tunjukkan semua aplikasi dengan tampalan tersuai yang digunakan.

Tetapkan bilangan hari maksimum bagi aplikasi lama yang masih boleh dianggap baru. Tetapkan kepada 0 hari jika anda mahu untuk melumpuhkan pergerakan aplikasi baru-baru ini dipasang untuk kebahagian atas.

(mini version with license and inapp emulation only)

Aplikasi ini adalah sebahagian daripada sistem operasi Android. Berhati-hati ketika melaksanakan apa-apa operasi terhadapnya, kerana anda boleh merosakkan-peranti anda. Mempunyai sandaran? Adakah anda pasti mahu bekerja dengan aplikasi ini?
"Change the directory on the SD Card where Lucky Patcher will store its files. The default path is /mnt/sdcard/Android/data/[package_name_of_lucky_patcher]/files/LuckyPatcher"
Perkhidmatan DalamAplikasi ke Gedung Google Play
Sesetengah aplikasi akan tertutup dengan sendiri jika terlalu banyak perkhidmatan DalamAplikasi diaktifkan.
Perkhidmatan Lesen ke Gedung Google Play
Sesetengah aplikasi akan tertutup dengan sendiri jika terlalu banyak perkhidmatan lesen diaktifkan.

Lucky Patcher mestilah dipasang ke memori dalaman. Jika tidak, beberapa ciri-ciri mungkin tidak berfungsi dengan betul.
Lucky Patcher mestilah dipasang ke memori dalaman. Ciri ini tidak berfungsi apabila Lucky Patcher berada di sd luaran.
Gagal untuk membuat sandaran fail-apk. Tiada keizinan untuk menyalin.
Fail \".jar\" tidak mengandungi classes.dex untuk ditampalkan. Cuba tampalkan fail \".odex\" ini untuk \".jar\".
Kesilapan dalam pengumpul log berlaku. Log tidak diciptakan.

Error creating .oat file for patched classes.dex. Patch has made some errors in classes.dex or some problems with the firmware. Try changing the java-root method in the settings of Lucky Patcher. It can help sometimes.
"Could not delete the file join_patch.txt Delete the file manually or patch folder."
Nampaknya Lucky Patcher telah dipaksa tutup serta-merta, adakah anda mahu menghantar laporan kerosakan?
Application is installed, but it was not possible to copy the cache to /Android/obb folder.
Could not get the classes.dex files for the patch.

Aplikasi tidak dikongsi. Ralat tidak diketahui. Cuba tukar direktori yang berfungsi untuk Lucky Patcher.
Data untuk membuat lesen tidak ditemui.
Ralat: Proses mencipta odex gagal... Kemungkinan ruang cakera yang tidak mencukupi.
Aplikasi ini tidak mengandungi classes.dex. Pengoptimuman Dex adalah mustahil.
Memori (RAM) tidak cukup untuk menyelesaikan operasi ini. Heap VM terlalu kecil.
Direktori telah wujud. Sila masukkan laluan baru.

Lumpuhkan pemuat ikon daripada pangkalan data Lucky Patcher. Ini membuatkan senarai aplikasi yang lembab...

Jika kerja-kerja aplikasi tidak betul, sila pasangkannya semula dan tidak mencuba untuk menampal versi ini daripadanya."
Clear data of google services for fix the problem of logging into google account inside Google Play
"This is a split application. When creating a backup, a container of the 'apks' type will be created;"

P.S.: Lucky Patcher closes an application when it applies a patch to it. This is necessary so that the new changes will persist. However, sometimes you may also need to restart the device itself or use a third-party tool to kill the process or processes of the affected application to see the changes.

*%1$s - A list of applications that will be patched on boot. At this point, it is useful only for custom patches requiring the correction of .so libraries. It will be indicated in the description of those custom patches to add them to the Bootlist.
automatically adds the current user patch to \"%1$s\". Should be used in the patch library (or in the patch [CLASSES] without [ODEX] or without [PACKAGE])
"Add file from Lucky Patcher dir to apk archive: Example:"
"patches all files in the directory. \"dir\" - directory for patch files. \"template\" - template for files to patch (only \"*\" can be used in the template). Example:"
pattern search/replace for all native libraries

Apply this pattern only for apk with build=apk_build. You can apply pattern for build>=apk_build (Example: {\"apk_build\":\"206+\"}) or can apply for build less or equal apk_build (Example: {\"apk_build\":\"206-\"}).
You can apply the patch pattern for the apk version interval if you specify two apk_builds:
patch comments that are visible to the user pre-patch
The start mark, all the text after it and up to the first field [CLASSES], [LIB], [END], etc. will be displayed at the beginning of the patch log for the user.
"blocks listed internet hosts. \"host\" - the host you want to block. Example:"

"Patches dalvik-cache applications. Do not forget that the system periodically updates dalvik-cache applications and all the changes will disappear. Therefore, we must add [ADD-BOOT]. The patch for dalvik-cache is outdated, as it is unreliable. But it is needed for the ROM Toolbox, because it does not work well with odex-files. Example:"
Apply a patch to one specific classes file (for example: {\"classes_name\":\"classes2.dex\"}, {\"classes_name\":\"classes3.dex\"}, {\"classes_name\":\"classes.dex\"} ...).
Here are the lines for the classes.dex patch. They can be search, original-replaced and other options described below.
"Enable or disable components of Applications. Example:"
"Copy file from Lucky Patcher dir to path with new file name: Example:"
Path to database on Device, or you can use only database name for Lucky Patcher self search file.

You have edited everything, save and drop the file into the \"CustomPatches\" directory located in the Lucky Patcher folder. This folder can be viewed in the \"About\" section at the very top. Then the program is highlighted in yellow, and you can apply this patch to it.
patch comments that are visible to the user post-patch
pattern search/replace for file from apk file (this patch working only for rebuild apk with this custom patch)
- The patch file must have the same name as the target APK (this is case sensitive).
- If the file is a custom patch for the application already exists, you can simply add at the beginning of the file name of any Text and save it as near the existing.

- If you want to write a patch once a series of programs on a single firm, then the end the custom patch file name, you can use _%ALL%, for example the name of the patch for all the votes SVOX will look like this: com.svox.classic.langpack_%ALL%.txt. On the _%ALL% is replaced by the name part of the package, which varies depending on the application of the firm. Do not use special characters/formatting in the patch file (single spaces only). If you need to make a patch for several programs of one firm and add a prefix at the beginning, you can use %ALL%_ and _%ALL%. (Example name: chelpus.%ALL%_com.android._%ALL%.txt).
- You can use to custom patch content %PACKAGE_NAME% for path to files, this %PACKAGE_NAME% replace to package name of target applications.
- To search for patterns of bytes use IDA Pro 6.1+. It can open dalvik-cache, odex, libraries and classes.dex.

- If you want to patch dalvik-cache or odex, do not forget that the bytes of data in different firmware versions may vary. And keep in mind that not all classes.dex in the bytes coincide with dalvik-cache and odex. In this example you can see, if you open classes.dex and odex-file in IDA Pro.

"- In Lucky Patcher ver.6.5.4+ the ability to create lpzip files is added. It's a zip archive, which can contain apk files and custom patches. Apk will to be installed. Custom patches will be automatically imported into Lucky Patcher. (Example: installSomeAppsWithPatch.lpzip)"

"Marks patterns of the group (group number could be 1 or higher). You may be asking 'What does this mean?'. Well, what it means is that If at least one pattern from the group has succeeded, a successfully patched message will be shown. This is useful when you try to make a universal patch for multiple versions of a particular application (for example, patch all versions of Google Play to disable automatic updates)."
"Adding and subtracting decimal numbers from the original byte ... For example:"
"If you want to insert the data length is greater or smaller than the length of the original pattern. (Example)file before patch contain:\"chelpa end\""
pattern search/replace for named native libraries (see below)>

This means that the lines for the patch of the library of this program will follow, \"name\" is the name of the library (if you put * instead of the name, then all application libraries will be patched).

"Usually indicates the object to which the patch will be applied. It can be just a file name, a file name with a path, and the like. In some cases, you can use '*' to patch all libraries, for example, if the name of the library is unknown."

"Uses for the patch has already been created odex. For example, an application has been patched with the automatic mode by Remove License Verification, but you need to make additional changes by using a Custom Patch. If we use a simple [PACKAGE]-[CLASSES], [ODEX] or [CLASSES]-[ODEX], odex-file will be created with no change and only then patched. In this version of Lucky Patcher, this is no longer required, since there is an option \"%1$s\". Example:"

On older Androids, this tag could be used. Instead of the tag [CLASSES], you can use this one. Then the changes in classes.dex will be saved not in dalvik-cache, where they periodically disappear when the system updates the cache, but in a separate file with the odex extension next to the apk of the application, which will fix all the changes and leave the original dalvik-cache intact - this is just in case, if the application checks it. You can use [ODEX] after [CLASSES], then the changes will be made to the dalvik cache and automatically committed to odex. This is not necessary on modern firmware.
This offset is relative to the start in hexadecimal format for applying the patch.
This is a pattern mask used to find the offset where the patch will be applied.
In this example, bytes make up the pattern mask, and (??, **) means any byte.
pattern search/replace for named other files in /data/data/Package_Target_APK/ or in /sdcard (see below)
unpacks classes.dex and applies all the patches from the [CLASSES] to it. And generates, based on the modified classes.dex, odex-file.

This tag means that we will not patch dalvik-cache directly, but we will pull out classes.dex from target application, patch (with patches that follow the identifiers [CLASSES] or [ODEX]), create an odex image with changes and put to application. This is the image that TitaniumBuckup needs, for example. it checks it and all check-sums inside it must be correct. It is advisable to use this tag always, because such a patch is the most correct, but if it causes any problems, it is possible without it.
"Analog linux command \"chmod permissions file_name\" for files in data dir of Application: Example:"
this will follow an \"original\" statement, this is what the offset will be overwritten with bytes from the file (file must saved near custom patch).
This is done in order to avoid writing very long templates to replace.
This must follow \"original\" or \"offset\", this is what these bytes will be overwritten with, or written at the specified offset. Bytes in places marked with (?? or **) remain untouched:
In this example, bytes W0, W1, W2 are stored bytes from the previously executed \"search\"

"Sets smali variable to 0 (convert hex number to: 43->03,54->04...) or 1 (convert hex number to: 43->13,04->14...) respectively or set, SQ convert hex 34->44, 51->11 ... For example, there is a variable : const/4 v?,0x00 . The question mark shows , that var's number is unknown (for example, it has been changed in the newer version), but you are sure, that this var equals 0, and you want to set it to 1. In this case pattern will look like:"
And vice versa, to set variable to 0:
Search allows you to search for a pattern and store bytes at specific positions.
means that the bytes at those positions will be stored in R0, R1, R2. Now that they are found and saved, you can use them in replacement patterns only by replacing R with W.
"Shared preferences xml file editor (insert or remove variables): Example:"
"Sometimes the target application must change something in the database, then to help will come this possibility: Example:"
Detailed description of tags and their parameters:

Do not remove jumps or make them unconditional! The Optimizer will crash and your patch will not work on ART! To avoid this, use conditional jumps. For example, if there is a need to jump, replace the jump with the if-eq v0,v0 (bytes: 32 00 ?? ??). If there is no need to jump in a particular place, you can insert a jump such as if-ne v0,v0 (bytes: 33 00 ?? ??); also feel free to use your own equivalent.
Advertisements were found within this application;

In the default mode, all changes remain in the ODEX file. Copying to the dalvik-cache can help when ODEX files do not work for the application (for example, when an application is moved to an SD card). However, you will need to reinstall the application to restore it.
Backup APK file to restore later. APK file is saved to backups folder.
Backs up application data from internal memory to the Lucky Patcher folder.
Copy APK file to SD card in the Data Folder of Lucky Patcher. You can reinstall (to restore) the application from this APK.

Creates an installation package APK with the preapplied patches. You should keep in mind, that rebuilt application may not work the same way as an application that has been patched through the patcher. This issue is present because an application can check itself to find any changes in the code and signature.
Create an unchanged ODEX file of the application.

Sometimes the application does not start after rebuilding, or it complains about an incorrect signature or dex files checksum, or does not make purchases, and the like. In this case, this function can help. It injects code that tries to trick the signature verification or dex files checksum verification inside the application. This option should only be applied to the original application. If applied to an already patched one, then this option will break even if it has already been successfully implemented. As a result of the method, the size of the application will double.

Removes chosen permissions, services, activities, etc. This ability is built into Android, and therefore is not harmful. The only thing that can stop working is the modified application, which can easily be fixed by enabling back permissions.

Removes permissions of the application (edits system file packages.xml). Be very careful while doing this. On some devices, this method can lead to a circular reboot or other undesirable consequences. Make a backup of the system before you try to disable permissions.

Attempts to remove license check. Uses a small Part of the Templates to ensure maximum stability of the application. If the percentage gotten using this method is low, make sure that the internet connection is present while using the patched app.

Attempts to remove license check. Ensures maximum stability of the application after the patch. But for the hacked application to work at the first start, you need installed Google Play and the Internet.
There are a few differences from \"%1$s\". It may help, if \"%1$s\" did not patch the application successfully.

Attempts to completely remove license check. Uses all Templates. The patched application may become unstable, usually instability occurs when the application is offline. Restarting the application over and over, changing or disabling screen orientation may help.

The target application must be signed the developer signature, and not changed by someone else. For a positive effect of patches, you need an installed GooglePlay (Google market) with a valid account entered into it and the Internet turned on when you first start the target application. Always try to remove the license check first using \"%1$s\", if it does not help, try \"%2$s\". If it causes critical errors, you can try to select only some templates in \"%3$s\"
Applies chosen templates to the application to remove license verification.
Converts the user application to system application.

This setting is not relevant anymore, because on new versions of Lucky Patcher, all of the changes are saved to an ODEX file of the application, which does not change on reboot. This setting can only be useful if a custom patch changes \".so\" libraries of the application, which will be indicated in the description of the patch.
Disable different application activities manually. Some activities have a description of what they do. Activities can be enabled back if the application stops working.
Attempts to remove advertisements. Try using this patch even if Lucky Patcher has not found ads in an application that contains ads. It may remove those ads.
After creating the ODEX file, dalvik-cache of the application is deleted to save space. If the application does not work with ODEX, you will have to reinstall the application.
Removes ODEX file containing the changes. Thus, restoring the application to its original status.
Remove purchases saved through Google Billing Emulation.
Restore application from an APK file in backups folder.
Restore application data stored in internal memory in the /data/data/application_package_name/ folder.

Removes chosen permissions by rebuilding the APK with changes. This method does not change the application signature. This only works on system applications, or on all apps if \"%1$s\" patch is applied to Android.
Similar to safe method, except this method uses new signature and does not keep the original signature. The application may not work correct using this method if it checks the signature.
Creates a backup APK file of the selected application and shares it though any app.

Sometimes the application does not start after rebuilding, or it complains about an incorrect signature, or does not make purchases, and the like. In this case, this function can help. It injects code that tries to trick the signature verification inside the application. This option should only be applied to the original application. If applied to an already patched one, then this option will break even if it has already been successfully implemented.
Adds support for InApp emulation to the application. InApp emulation can be switched on in Toggles menu.

"Recompiling application-target with a \"%1$s\", delete the original application (renamed the folder with a cache that wasn't removed). Install the application in recompiling the variant (rename back the folder with a cache, if there was). For the method to work, you must enable \"%2$s\" in the Lucky Patcher switches. All you can try to buy. Rarely works, but miracles happen :)"
"Sometimes, purchase protection uses application signature verification. In this case, using the \"%1$s\" option can help. "

"Apply the first patch Android (%1$s) and install a modified market version 3+. After that, all your purchases will be redirected to the Lucky Patcher, If it is enabled option \"%2$s\". To return to normal legal shopping mode, enough to turn off the switch \"%2$s\". This method is identical to the work of Freedom and is not inferior to him in efficiency, but implemented a modification of Google Play, that allows you to make purchases without disrupting operation of Google Play.
How to do it? - Install Lucky Patcher :) - Select the lower panel of the Lucky Patcher \"%3$s->%4$s\", select the top item (%1$s) tap to apply. After rebooting the first patch in this dialogue must be marked as 2/2 is applied. (You can skip this step, but it is better to do so, because, if it doesn't work, then from then on to do something does not make sense). If the patch apply failed, you can try using the first option module Xposed Lucky Patcher; - Launch Lucky Patcher, turn on the Internet connection and choose the lower panel \"%3$s->%5$s\", choose the correct version and click install; - Make Google Play test in \"%3$s->%6$s\". "
Apply the first patch Android (Signature verification is always true) and run by switches \"%1$s\". After that, all your purchases will be redirected to the Lucky Patcher.

"If you have Xposed on your device, you can to turn on the Xposed module of Lucky Patcher. Attention: include a fourth option in Xposed module \"%1$s\" you need only, if you have not installed a modified Google Play. If modified Google Play is not set, that having included the first and fourth option you can make in-app purchases. The fifth option, you can try to hide Lucky Patcher from the application, if it grumbles."

"Applied to the application target \"%1$s\". After that, all purchases must be redirected to the Lucky Patcher. For the method to work, you must enable \"%2$s\" in the Lucky Patcher switches. Or we apply the patch \"%3$s\" (very long) and all purchases are redirected to Lucky Patcher directly without a proxy."

"- It is working not at all applications, since InApp purchase code can be hidden in a place inaccessible to the patch. - is not effective in applications with protection by checking the original information about purchases. "

At inclusion of this option upon the following purchase of the same, purchase will be made without dialogue Lucky Patcher about purchase (purchase immediately comes into your application without any questions). It`s necessary, when you collect the gold in the application, etc., not to press every time that you agree to buy :) Delete autopurchase can at long pressing on the application in the list of Lucky Patcher and selecting \"%1$s\" then remove unnecessary autopurchases in the list.

"it makes sense for users without root privileges, for older games and applications, where the authors do not inadvertently checked the signature data. When this option is on, false data about purchase will be sent to the application with a blank signature and there's a chance, that this purchase will find correct and activate the application. Users with root privileges better do not use this option, can do more harm than help."

This rebuilt application will only work with Lucky Patchter installed on this device. If you transfer this application to another device, purchases will not be emulated. To transfer the application to another device with a support patch, use the method \"Support patch for InApp emulation (Proxy server)\" and install the \"Proxy server for emulation of inapp purchases\" on another device, or rebuild this application directly on another device.
Support patch for InApp emulation (Proxy server)
Redirect billing to Lucky Patcher using a proxy server for emulation of inapp purchases. If patch to Android \"Signature Verification status always True\" is not applied, this support patch can help.

This version of modded GooglePlay cannot be installed in the system partition. Install it as a user application. Otherwise, you will not be able to connect to your google account.

You can install the original Google Play as system, and then as user modded Google Play. If you have problems with Google Play, try to install it as user app with the option \"%1s\" and give it all permissions.
